about.title: About Me
about.p1: I'm a junior developer from <location>Palma de Mallorca, Spain</location>, currently in my second year of DAM (Cross-platform Application Development).
about.p2: My main focus is <highlight>backend development</highlight>: building APIs, working with databases, and creating data-driven applications. I approach problems methodically: first understand, then plan the architecture, and then write clean code.
about.p3: Beyond backend, I have experience in Android development and full-stack projects. I'm looking for an environment where I can grow technically while contributing to impactful projects.
